long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
MAL-Sync â€” is a powerful extension for anime/manga fans who love tracking their progress and have a convenient access to their library âœ¨

This extension syncs with your favorite anime databases: MyAnimeList, AniList, Kitsu, Simkl â€” and integrates them into your favorite streaming sites with auto episode tracking.

MAL-Sync supports 100+ anime and manga pages like Crunchyroll, Netflix, MangaDex, 9anime â€” it even has support for Plex and apps alike! ğŸ”¥

A full list can be found in our GitHub page:
https://github.com/MALSync/MALSync#mal-sync

So, what are the core features of MAL-Sync?
ğŸ‘€ Anime and manga tracking
ğŸ“‚ Beautiful library â€” one click away!
ğŸ“‘ Anime/manga overview with all the necessary information
ğŸ”  Translated into different languages
ğŸ¨ Design customization
ğŸ” List Sync â€” transfer the progress between different databases, e.g., MAL to AniList, and vice versa
ğŸ¥ Video player improvements
ğŸ“º Full size version (PWA)

And much-much more!

Join our community on Discord:
https://discord.com/invite/cTH4yaw
long.de,es,it,nl,pt_BR,sv,tr:
Works with Anilist/Kitsu too. Just change the sync mode in the settings.

Makes it possible to use your MyAnimeList anime/mangalist as a centralized bookmarks system for all supported pages.

â–º Anime:
  â— crunchyroll.com
  â— netflix.com
  â— kissanime.ru
  â— 9anime.to
  â— otakustream.tv
  â— gogoanimes.co
  â— twist.moe
  â— anime4you.one
  â— animeflv.net
  â— jkanime.net
  â— branitube.org
  â— turkanime.tv

â–º Manga:
  â— kissmanga.com
  â— mangadex.org
  â— mangarock.com

What else can it do?

MyAnimeList
  - Direct links to the supported websites
  - Links to the next episode
  - Enlarge thumbnails in many places
  - Adds missing watching status tags like in the related anime section
  - Estimated time to next episode and estimated current episode number 
    (JP release time)

miniMAL (Extension Popup)
  - Allows to browse, search and edit MyAnimeList anime/manga 
    everywhere
  - Access MAL Bookmarks everywhere
  - MAL-Sync's Settings

Update Check [BETA]
  * This feature is disabled by default. You will need to enable 
     it in the miniMAL popup
  - Checks for new episodes/chapters in the background and sends 
    out a notification
  - Updates the links to the next episode
  - Makes current episode estimation more accurate


Github: https://github.com/lolamtisch/MALSync
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/cTH4yaw
long.fr,id,ms:
Works with Anilist/Kitsu too. Just change the sync mode in the settings.

Makes it possible to use your MyAnimeList anime/mangalist as a centralized bookmarks system for all supported pages.

It has support for 30+ anime and manga pages like crunchyroll, netflix, mangadex, kissanime and 9anime. 
A full list can be found on the github page:
https://github.com/lolamtisch/MALSync#mal-sync

What else can it do?

MyAnimeList
  - Direct links to the supported websites
  - Links to the next episode
  - Enlarge thumbnails in many places
  - Adds missing watching status tags like in the related anime section
  - Estimated time to next episode and estimated current episode number 
    (JP release time)

miniMAL (Extension Popup)
  - Allows to browse, search and edit MyAnimeList anime/manga 
    everywhere
  - Access MAL Bookmarks everywhere
  - MAL-Sync's Settings

Update Check [BETA]
  * This feature is disabled by default. You will need to enable 
     it in the miniMAL popup
  - Checks for new episodes/chapters in the background and sends 
    out a notification
  - Updates the links to the next episode
  - Makes current episode estimation more accurate


Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/cTH4yaw
